intro_welcome_header: Welcome to the home of Amax Emu!
intro_welcome_description: Blur is a pretty decent game.

how_to_play.login_step_text: Login with your Discord account using the button below
how_to_play.create_amax_account_text: Create Amax emu (in game) account using the button below.
how_to_play.blur_download_step_text: Install Blur from your legally owned DVD from 2010 or download it from your Steam library.
how_to_play.patch_step_text1: You can download patch 1.2 files from here.
how_to_play.patch_step_text2: You don't need to do it if you installed game thought Steam
how_to_play.patch_step_text3: Place patch files to the root of your Blur installation
how_to_play.amax_emu_step_text: Download latest Amax Emu files from here and place them into root of your Blur installation.
how_to_play.amax_emu_login_step_header: Login into the Amax Emu in the game
how_to_play.amax_emu_login_step_text: Login into the Amax Emu using your username and password.
how_to_play.play_step_text: Enjoy Blur like it is 2010 again!
